attributes.comment:
Entered on 03/28/2007 at 10:05:36 by Chrystal Ballard:
As a single, adoptive mother who just completed my first of what I hope to be two
international
adoptions, I would like to say I would appreciate any help in cutting the financial
burder. Please
seriously consider the costs of giving these children a loving home....Please do
NOT raise the
USCIS fees for adoption. I would also like to see the 171H document life increased
to be good
for two years instead of just one since the adoption process is beginning to take
longer. It is a
very frustrating thing to have a case that takes longer and you have to get an
extension on your
171H or apply for another one altogether.

Thank you for considering these topics.
Sincerely,
Chrystal Ballard

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Chrystal K. Ballard
